Hi, I was teaching one of my coworkers how to create a parameterized
test c=
ase to solve some of his problems, but he asked me a zinger.  How
will I kn=
ow when I look at the CruiseControl test results page which
test instance g=
oes with which parameters?  I didn't really know.

We're using CruiseContro=
l and JUnit 3.8.  The default Test Results page
just shows the name of the =
test methods, their status (Success, Failure,
or Error), and how long they =
took to run.  But if he's got a suite of 20
instances of the same test (jus=
t with different constructor arguments)
how can he tell which one it was th=
at failed?


Thanks,
Todd.
